item.title: Waymo co-CEO on robotaxi vandalism: ‘We’re not standing for it’
item.description: Waymo co-CEO Tekedra Mawakana opened up at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 about the vandalism of its cars and how the company pushes back on government surve...

item.title: Robotaxi companies must do more to prove safety, Waymo co-CEO says
item.description: Waymo co-CEO Tekedra Mawakana urged rival autonomous vehicle companies to be more transparent about their safety data.

item.title: Amazon reportedly plans to cut around 30,000 corporate jobs
item.description: Amazon could be planning to cut up to 30,000 corporate positions starting on Tuesday.

item.title: OpenAI says over a million people talk to ChatGPT about suicide weekly
item.description: OpenAI released data on just how many of ChatGPT's users are facing mental health challenges, and how its addressing them.

item.title: Fitbit’s revamped app, with Gemini-powered health coach, rolls out to Premium users
item.description: Fitbit’s Gemini-powered health coach is rolling out to Premium subscribers in the U.S. on Android.
